name: Sage Software
description: At Sage, we transform the way people think, work, and leverage AI and machine learning, enabling their organizations to thrive. In 1981, our founder David Goldman wanted to create quotes quickly for his print business and keep track of his accounts. David worked with a team from Newcastle University, including Dr. Paul Muller, a computer expert who worked with NASA, and Graham Wylie, a student. Our founders realized that other businesses could benefit from this too. Some eight years later, Sage was listed on the London Stock Exchange with a £20m (USD 24.5m) valuation.
Headline: At Sage, we knock down barriers with information, insights, and tools to help your business flow.
ShortDescription: At Sage, we transform the way people think, work, and leverage AI and machine learning, enabling their organizations to thrive.
enhanced_description: Sage Software provides tools, information, and insights designed to transform the way organizations operate, helping them to thrive. Established in 1981, Sage began with a focus on efficient accounting and quoting, quickly expanding its offerings for a broader business audience. The company leverages advanced AI and machine learning to enable businesses to improve employee happiness and engagement. With a strong emphasis on expert human support and integrated solutions, Sage aims to remove barriers and streamline business processes.
key_use_cases: Leveraging AI and machine learning for business operations
